extensionName.description: Name of the extension; Should be kept as is when localizing.

extensionDescription.message: Auto-fill username when you open websites in certain container.

inputUsernameNotice.message: Input username in webpage first before adding new rule.
inputUsernameNotice.description: Notify user should input username in webpage first before adding new rule.

addRuleNotice.message: Would you like to use {username} for {host} in {container} next time?
addRuleNotice.description: Dialog when user try to add rules; Words in {} are placeholders, and they should not be localized.

updateRuleConfirm.description: Button in dialog for confirm, old rule for different username already exist

addedRuleNotice.message: Account per container rule added. Auto-fill {username} for {host} in {container} next time.

optionsTableHost.description: Title of host column in options page

optionsTableContainer.description: Title of container column in options page

optionsTableUsername.description: Title of username column in options page

emptyRuleList.message: To create rules, visit website login page in a container and type in your user name as normal. You will find an icon in address bar to add it here.
emptyRuleList.description: Show tips to user when no rule added in options page.
